entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Wainwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:37 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Wainwright 10:00 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: -16.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -18.8°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 7:29 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Fog dissipating. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog becoming fog patches in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:29 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
